description.value:
Trigger You would be reduced to 0 Hit Points but not immediately killed.

Requirements You are in Tenacious Stance.

You fight on, staying on your feet and lashing out at a foe. You avoid being knocked out and remain at 1 Hit Point, and your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Wounded] condition increases by 1. Make a melee Strike at an enemy within reach. You immediately end your Tenacious Stance.
